title: Stock Selloff Extends as Tech, Silver Rout Worsens: Markets Wrap
description: Global stocks extended their tumble into Asian trading on Friday after heavy losses in US tech stocks and cryptocurrencies sapped risk appetite. Silver slid again while Treasuries advanced.
content: Global stocks extended their tumble into Asian trading on Friday after heavy losses in US tech stocks and cryptocurrencies sapped risk appetite. Silver slid again while Treasuries advanced.
